title: Game of #shells
synopsis: "Game of #shells" is a talk about battles between Red and Blue team. As stories always have more than one perspective, then for the first time ever on Disobey stage we will unveil some epic ****ups that either side had to confront throughout several months. Come on down, ask all the questions you haven't had the guts to ask from either side: Red or The bluez

speakers.name: Rasmus 'razu' MÃ¤nna
speakers.bio: Dedicated Blue Teamer. I deal with Blue Teaming stuff and clean up after Red Teamers.

speakers.name: Taavi Sonets - "The expert."
speakers.bio: Red Teamer, pentester, trainer. My work involves getting into places where I am not supposed to be and then sharing the tales. For everything else, there is Linkedin.
